pages.text:
Manasteel Chickens are a species of ferric chickens. Much like actual steel, it's made by forging iron with the use of a strengthening agent; Mana doesn't seem to have as much of an effect as carbon does, but it does imbue the metal with some... pecularities.
Lay Item: Manasteel Ingots.$(br2)Let two iron chickens have a successful peaceful rest in the Odd Pagoda.
This ''therapy'' requires no more than a minute, and requires but a handful of Mana.
